General.Name: Legolas Exchange
General.Description: The Legolas Exchange is an exchange that runs on an hybrid model, incorporating a decentralized ledger within its proprietary centralized platform in a bid to provide unalterability, temporality, and transparency of the order book. The exchange system is fueled by the LGO token, an ERC-20 token based on ethereum used to pay for Order fees and other paid services provided by Legolas.

ICO.Description:
The Legolas Exchange is an exchange that runs on an hybrid model, incorporating a decentralized ledger within its proprietary centralized platform in a bid to provide unalterability, temporality, and transparency of the order book. The exchange system is fueled by the LGO token, an ERC-20 token based on Ethereum used to pay for Order fees and other paid services provided by Legolas.

Team:

  • Frédéric Montagnon: CEO 
  • Julien Romanetto: COO 
  • Ouziel Slama: CTO 
  • Yaacov Akiba: Slama Principal Architect 

The Legolas Exchange ICO will start on the 1st of February, 2018. The ICO token allocation represents 60% of the total token supply which will be available for a 0.00005 BTC starting price. The ICO funding cap is set at 2000 BTC.

Token Reserve Split (40%):

  • Reserve: 20%
  • Advisors: 5%
  • Team: 15%
